text: Neiz yeh log aapas mein kehte hain ke apne mazhab waley ke siwa kisi ki baat na maano. Aey Nabi! Insey kehdo ke, “asal mein hidayat to Allah ki hidayat hai aur yeh usi ki dain hai ke kisi ko wahi kuch de diya jaye jo kabhi tumko diya gaya tha, ya yeh ke dusron ko tumhare Rubb ke huzoor pesh karne ke liye tumhare khilaf koi hujjat mil jaye. “(Aey Nabi)! Inse kaho ke, “ fazal o sharf Allah ke ikhtiyar mein hai, jisey chahe ata farmaye. Woh waseeh ul nazar hai aur sab kuch jaanta hai
